mapper.insert: insert into wishList( wishlist_id, member_id, game_no, added_date ) values(#{wishlistId}, #{memberId}, #{gameNo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT w.*, g.game_title AS gameTitle, g.game_price AS gamePrice, gI.attachment_no AS attachmentNo FROM wishList w JOIN game g ON w.game_no = g.game_no -- gameNo로 연결 LEFT JOIN game_image gI ON g.game_no = gI.game_no -- gameNo로 연결 WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT w.wishlist_id, w.member_id, g.game_no, g.game_title, TO_CHAR(g.game_publication_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS release_date, g.game_price FROM wishList w LEFT OUTER JOIN game g ON w.game_no = g.game_no WHERE INSTR(LOWER(g.game_title), LOWER(#{keyword})) > 0 ORDER BY g.game_title ASC
